summary: REQ-3 is partially implemented by wiring the Parquet Flooring additionalOfferings entry to mediaCategory "parquet-flooring" in services.ts. The required parquet image asset was not added, and the diff does not provide evidence of a new parquet-flooring GalleryItem or Services page rendering the MediaStrip for Parquet Flooring.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new generated static image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg (loadable via the public assets approach).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, so there is no evidence the required image asset was created at the specified path/filename.
evidence: File diff summary: "Added: 0" and "ADDED FILES: - none"

missing_requirements.requirement: Add at least one new GalleryItem in frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts with category "parquet-flooring" and path "assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg" (unique id).
missing_requirements.reason: The shown/truncated portion of galleryMedia.ts contains curtains and wallpaper items only; there is no evidence of any new GalleryItem for category "parquet-flooring" or referencing the specified parquet image path.
evidence: frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts (truncated): shows categories "curtains-drapes" and "wallpaper-solutions"; no visible "parquet-flooring" entry

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Services page Additional Offerings Parquet Flooring card renders a MediaStrip and displays parquet-flooring media items.
missing_requirements.reason: While services.ts sets mediaCategory to "parquet-flooring", there is no diff evidence that frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx was updated (or already supports rendering MediaStrip for all offerings with mediaCategory) to display parquet media items.
evidence: frontend/src/content/services.ts: Parquet Flooring offering includes mediaCategory: 'parquet-flooring'
File diff summary: no modification listed for frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx
